page.title: 13HOME LIFE OF HELEN
page.content: My day as a 13 year old child starts at 6.30am, when I go to feed my pony. I get back at 7.30am, get changed and have my breakfast. At 8.30am I go to school, till 3.45pm. I go home and change into my riding clothes, then go riding at 4.10pm till 7.30pm. After riding I do my homework, and have tea. At 10.30pm I go to bed. A day in the life of a working mother starts at 6.30am to take me to my pony. Then she gets the breakfast on, and then dresses my brother David. She takes him to school, and goes into work at 9.00am till 8.00pm. She has an hour for lunch time. When she gets in she gets tea on, and then she washes up, and irons. She goes to bed at 12.00am.
